thread.section_title: Hotel Saint-Jacques - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Lovely stay - Review of Hotel Saint-Jacques, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jen_Rodgers89
title: Lovely stay
text: Amazing decor, clean room, very helpful staff. Good location - close to metro station which makes getting around Paris very easy. Nice eateries near to the hotel where it. E for breakfast, lunch or dinner, there's lots of choice near by. Pantheon isn't far at all from the hotel and from there you can walk easy to the Luxembourg gardens.
